dialogues.RIZZO:
[1]Help me! Anyone! Somebody help me! 
[2]Hey! 
[3]You son of a bitch! 
[4]Nooooooo! 
[5]Somebody! No! 
[6]No . . . 
[7]Where..? Who . . .? I'm alive. You brought me back. 
[8]What the hell is this shit? 
[9]How did I get here, how did you bring me back? 
[10]Nano...but nanotechnology is impossible. 
[11]30? How long was I out? 
[12]
[13]Hockey player? He's not a ... 
[14]Old Earth? 
[15]But...I...400 years? 
[16]Yeah? 
[17]You're telling me I'm a friggen class project? 
[18]Dissection? 
[19]Jason? He's on this ship?! 
[20]Are you finished? 
[21]Where is he? 
[22]No, you're dead! You're all dead! 
[23]What have I done?! Idiots. 
[24]I'll tell you where he is. He's walking around this ship, killing anything that moves. 
[25]Jason! Can't you see? He did this. 
[26]I didn't say he was alive. 
[27]Get him out of there! 
[28]I told you! Get them out of there! Get out of there! Get out of there now! 
[29]He's dead. They're both dead. You don't understand what is on this ship. This is a being that kills. That's what he does. That's all he does. And he is very good at it. 
[30]We have to get off this ship. 
[31]Why don't you get it? He's going to kill us all! 
[32]Look! Just get everyone together, get off the ship... and then blow it to kingdom fucking come! That's the only way you're going to live. 
[33]I hope so. 
[34]Don't go out there. You can't win. We need to get off this ship. That's all there is to it. 
[35]Robot huh? 
[36]Barbie from hell... 
[37]Yeah 3cpo, I saw STAR WARS, now how about you help me get out of this coffin, Barbie... 
[38]I'm surrounded by idiots. 
[39]He'll kill us all. You know that, don't you? 
[40]So, you're saying thse guys have like, lasers and stuff? They could hack him to pieces? 
[41]
[42]Listen up duck fuckers, you can't kill this thing. 
[43]He's either unconcious or playing dead, whichever, he ain't really dead. Okay, you know , that's it for me. I'm outta here. 
[44]Isn't there an escape POD on this ship? Something? 
[45]Alright, been nice knowing you. Who's with me? 
[46]Do something!!! 
[47]Lesson number one, kiddies. You wanna get home safely then we get off this boat. 
[48]He wants to kill you...and me...and everyone on this ship. 
[49]Any questions? 
[50]You wanna die? 
[51]What good will that do? 
[52]More soldiers? 
[53]That's great. I bet they'll kick Jason's ass at a spelling bee! 
[54]Guys, please come with me! 
[55]tNighty-night. 
[56]Ok, who do I gotta fuck to get off this boat? 
[57]Listen to me. Please. Let's get off thsi ship. Come with me. 
[58]How do you open the damn door? 
[59]Yeah and he'll be here soon enough. Last chance. 
[60]Fine. Bye. 
[61]Which way? 
[62]Ssh. 
[63]He's in here. 
[64]You scream I'll snap your neck. Got it? 
[65]I just know. 
[66]Open the doors. 
[67]Keep trying! 
[68]Damnit, he's got them. 
[69]Then open the doors! 
[70]Three...two...one... 
[71]Damn! Close the door! I'll be right back. 
[72]I gotta go back. 
[73]Trust me, it's temporary. 
[74]Wait! 
[75]Forget the bridge, the shuttle's waiting! 
[76]Guys!!! The shuttle? 
[77]Idiots. 
[78]What are you doing? You can't save him! 
[79]Don't just stand there! Shoot him! 
[80]Don't stop! 
[81]You never stop when he's down! 
[82]Shit!!!! 
[83]Yeah, that's it, scare the hell out of here, that'll work. 
[84]Kkinsa, it's me, Rizzo. He's not out here right now, so please let us in. 
[85]Kkinsa, Crutch is hurt! We need access to the shuttle's med-kit or he'll die. 
[86]I guessed. 
[87]We're going to be okay, Kkinsa. Just relax. 
[88]
[89]400 years in the future and these pea-shooters are the best you can do?! 
[90]Just make a break for the door. He'll get some of us, but that's the breaks. 
[91]We don't have time to argue! 
[92]Okay, he was a great guy, now let's move out. 
[93]Look, I'm sorry. I really am, but aren't you forgetting about ... 
[94]What if you miss? 
[95]Yeah. Are you guys okay? 
[96]It's locked! 
[97]If the ship goes, so does Jaso. 
[98]No. 
[99]It's better this way. If we were rescued Jason would just get off the ship. You want him on your precious Earth II? 
[100]Boeman don't. You know I'm right. 
[101]What's that? 
[102]Are there any other shuttles? 
[103]Teleportation? Some way to beam us the hell out of dodge? 
[104]Hey. 
[105]Hey!! 
[106]What's this? 
[107]Can we get through these? 
[108]What if we blow the walkways first? Leave Jason over here to go up with the ship? 
[109]Any connection between your reality and mine is purely coincidental. 
[110]Come on. You got all these gadgets and shit. Why can't we get inside the right hull, seal up the doors and blow the walkways? 
[111]You got a better plan? 
[112]So, you thought you'd be cool. Go against your father's wishes? Yeah, that's grown up. 
[113]I thought you meant... 
[114]When I was four, the ocean quit producing life. Too many pollutants. Nuclear testing, the occasional terrorist bombing...the atmosphere was shit by the time I was eight. We moved underground when I was twelve. 
[115]My father was an army Scientist. Genetics. The army thought they could develop humans able to survive the Earth we had created 
[116]Jason seemed to have the right stuff. Physically, anyway. Radiation, cell damage, didn't matter. He just kept going. 
[117]I got along great with my father, my mother too. Dad and the others thought they could learn a great deal from this thing the army had been keeping on ice for over a hundred years. 
[118]They were all wrong. They couldn't control him. 
[119]I couldn't save them. 
[120]We can't lead him into the other hull! 
[121]Can we blow it with just two? 
[122]Sergeant, we could use a big bomb. 
[123]You killed him? 
[124]His mother? 
[125]I don't know. Nothing. 
[126]Hey, dickhead! 
[127]Go! 
[128]Oh, yeah, you remember me. 
[129]We made it? 
[130]Not so bad. 
[131]Weapons? All this technology and what good has it done?! 
[132]Done? 
[133]Why am I not surprised? 
[134]You know, this future shit sucks. I'll fucking do it. 
[135]Wait around on your asses all day. I'll need a distraction. 
[136]
[137]You want some of me? 
[138]
[139]Come on, keep up. 
[140]You want some of me or not? 
[141]Take your best shot -- 
[142]I'm melting! I'm melting! 
[143]See now that was stupid. Persistent, yes, but stupid. 
[144]Not this time, asshole. This time I'm gonna watch you burn in hell. 
[145]Make it fast. He's coming. 
[146]Delongpre! Out of time! 
[147]Guys, he's right behind us! 
[148]Oh sure, all the time. 
[149]Damit, Thorgan, whatever you're doing... you'd better hurry! I hate the future! 
[150]Is that...? 
[151]His mother was killed before his eyes. That's what drove him insane. It'll work. 
[152]Eat me. 
[153]Thorgan!!!! 
[154]He saved our lives. 
[155]Okay, good tip. 
[156]Why wouldn't we be. I mean, look around. So far so good. 
[157]No I'm not okay! I don't know what the hell I'm doing! 
[158]I think I had some when I was eight. 
[159]I think so, why? 
[160]Delongpre, you don't even know me. 
[161]grapples with Jason, but JASON IS JUST TOO STRONG. Jason holds HER with his good hand and REARS his metallic hand back. He's going to punch a hole right through her helmet, most likely throat her head, when -- 
[162]I'm stuck! 
[163]Oh great...yeah, having a great time, and you? 
[164]Old woman? 
[165]I get it. 
[166]Chinese, huh?
dialogues.YLLO:
[1]I'm missing two! 
[2]We're missing two of the kids! 
[3]Not without me! 
[4]Amazing! But, how . . I've been coming here for ten years. We never picked this up on our . . . KAY-EM? 
[5]Relax, Soldier boy, this is amazing. These remains are two hundred years old. 
[6]Well stop messing with her. I don't want a science droid with a personality. Now let's find them and get back. I want to get clearance to stay back and study this . . . 
[7]Keep your shirt on! I'm working on it. You won't believe what we found. Adrienne! Stoney! 
[8]What the hell are you two doing?! 
[9]You're both toast! 
[10]Is that? 
[11]Fat Lou, bring the ship to the following coordinates. Call Grendel, have them power up the labs, we're bringing in the find of the century! 
[12]This is a science excursion corporal. Just stay out of the way. 
[13]Okay, no screwing around. This is the real thing. Do exactly what I say. Okay Thorgan, open it up. 
[14]This is your find people. You want to give your credit away? 
[15]Kay-Em! 
[16]Thorgan?!!! 
[17]Janessa, stretcher. Keep your shirt on, sergeant. We have a medical emergency here not tot mention the discovery of a lifetime. 
[18]Fine, grab that end. 
[19]My God, look at him. Why would they freeze a dead body? Alright, load him up, and let's get out of here! 
[20]Kicker! 
[21]We have to get these two back in one piece! 
[22]Kicker! Do something! 
[23]No! He's coming with us! 
[24]Just get us to the ship! 
[25]Get them in the lab! 
[26]Back off! 
[27]Get them to the labs . . . Now! 
[28]What the hell are you doing? 
[29]I am an expert! 
[30]Brodski I'll talk slow so you can understand me. She's thawing. If we don't get her to the lab, she'll die, and that will be on your bald fucking head! 
[31]Well, when we rejuvenate this one you can ask her. 
[32]I don't give a shit. This one's prime for decryonization. We're brining her back. 
[33]I am a scientist you asshole! This could be the most important discovery in 400 years. Do you have any idea what a find like this could mean? 
[34]That's exactly what we need to find out. Check your orders, Sergeant. I out rank you where discovery is concerned. Now step aside. I have a medical emergency to deal with. 
[35]Get her prepped for the soup. Take the other one to lab two. 
[36]I know, dear, but this is too big a discovery. I need you to prep the second body. 
[37]This is a discovery that we will all share. We have to work as  a team. Now go. Stoney go with her. 
[38]Hands on training is rare. You should consider yourself lucky. 
[39]Delongpree, Status. How you doing? 
[40]Okay, people, we need to Learn everything there is to learn about our two guests. And if all goes well, I'll mention each one of you when I make my nobel prize speech. 
[41]Turn up the heat. 
[42]What do you expect from a culture that sucked its planet dry of resources. 
[43]Prep defib and start the cell reconstruction. 
[44]Is she stable? 
[45]We wait. I need about fifteen. Call me if there are any changes. If she farts I want a full report. 
[46]Later. 
[47]Secure line. Perez, Joshua, Solaras Space Lab. Connect. 
[48]We just left old Earth. You'll never believe what we found. 
[49]I'm sending you the files. 
[50]Trust me. I'm bypassing regular channels. See what kind of payday we're looking at. 
[51]Hypothetically, how much are we talking? 
[52]I'll reset our course . . . 3 hours? 
[53]All right, lets do this. Thorgan begin the Defib program, Delongpre, ready the drainage units. Boerman get the others in here. 
[54]It's time. 
[55]I've waited long enough. Kay . . . you know what to do. 
[56]What the hell are you doing? 
[57]Fine, just stay out of my way. Hit it. 
[58]We should expect a moment of disorientation. 
[59]She broke my fucking nose! 
[60]Obviously so. 
[61]Nanotechnology. 
[62]We've had Nano-Tech for the last 30 years. 
[63]The year is 2455. You've been frozen for the past four hundred years. 
[64]Now lay back we need to do some tests and I have some questions... 
[65]We need to do some tests...I'd like to ask you a few questions. 
[66]That's right, now if you could... 
[67]Wait a minute...I need... 
[68]Well? 
[69]More time...shit, she's had 400 years... 
[70]I'd want her statements before we reach porch. Jesus, women. 
[71]Of course he is. He's the most relevant find in 400 years...except for you, of course. Look if you're worried about PR don't be. You're walking and talking.  He's a stiff. You'll get the publicity. 
[72]God damnit! Will you stop doing that?! 
[73]Jesus! 
[74]Impossible! He was dead before he entered Cryo-statis. There is no possible way he could be alive. 
[75]Azrael can you repeat that? 
[76]That's impossible. 
[77]That's ridiculous. You're overreacting. 
[78]Looks like we're missing two. Stone and Kkinsa. 
[79]Stoney! Stoney if you can hear me, get your ass down to the lab immediately! I'm going to see if I can find them. 
[80]ALL I'm saying is dock with Space Lab, couple of hours no more. Let them take a look at our friends. 
[81]JUst don't go in there half cocked. You guys have a tendency to blow shit up and ask questions later. 
[82]This thing could be worth a great deal.... scientifically...not to mention what the fat cats on Earth II would pay for it! Look, I'll split it with you 50/50... 
[83]That bastard! Boemen turn on the tracking monitors. 
[84]At least try to get him alive...will ya Brodski? 
[85]Yeah, I got ya. I don't see anything inside though. 
[86]Yeah yeah. Got it. 
[87]Fat Lou, we're changing courses for the Solaras Space Lab. 
[88]We've got a situation here! Just do as  you're told! 
[89]Thank you. 
[90]Ok Sarge, what's your status? 
[91]But I didn't see... 
[92]Sergeant! 
[93]Nothing. 
[94]You're not going anywhere. 
[95]Are we locked down? 
[96]Then we wait. We're docking with Space Lab in less than an hour. 
[97]They can deal with this sort of thing. 
[98]Scientists. Very intellegent men. 
[99]Try to calm down. Just think, you're going to be famous! 
[100]4You're not going anywhere. 
[101]Shut up! She just wants this thing dead! 
[102]You're crazy! 
[103]Pack your shit. We'll disembark in an hour. The guys at Space Lab have the necessary equipment to contain this thing and then we can study it. 
[104]Computer on line. 
[105]Jesus! Can't you knock? Diminish power to shutttle Beowulf. 
[106]She's too valuable. She's not leaving this ship. 
[107]We must assume the machete was an intricate part of the game of hockey. 
[108]Thinking with your dick again, Delongpre? 
[109]They are not going anywhere. I cut power to the  shuttle. 
[110]Everyone ready? 
[111]Fat Lou, what's the ETA? 
[112]Lou, goddamjnit! Bernie, where's Lou?! 
[113]The ship doesn't need pilots to dock. We'll disembark and you'll see. Everything will be fine. 
[114]I guess...we'll have to go to the bridge. 
[115]It's alright. He can't get in here! 
[116]Crutch? 
[117]Will that take us to the bridge? 
[118]We'll engage auto-pilot! Everything'll be fine! 
[119]Move it people! 
[120]Now hold on! Have you considered how valuable you are? Credit, fame, you can have it all. And ladies. I mean, how long has it been? 
[121]That's all you wanted? 
[122]It's okay, he just wanted his machete.
dialogues.DELONGPRE:
[1]And what's with the headgear? 
[2]She's red. Body temp 98.6. This is so cool. 
[3]Now what? 
[4]Try next door, there was one there yesterday. 
[5]What about the others? Shouldn't we wait? 
[6]Spunky . . . 
[7]It can wait. Let's get you cleaned up. 
[8]Come on. 
[9]Rizzo? 
[10]I thought that after 400 hundred years, you just might have a little bit of an appetite. 
[11]You're on Grendel, a class IV Catamaran transport. It's basically a school bus. We're on our way back to Earth II. It's finals week. 
[12]Sort of. I mean, no, not really ... 
[13]I'll give you a moment alone. Do you want me to come get you when we start the dissection? 
[14]She needs a little time. 
[15]That's really funny. 
[16]Yeah, like you'd be a rock after everything she went through? 
[17]Oh I like her a lot. 
[18]Er, guys. Where's the Hockey Player? 
[19]Where are you going? 
[20]You just need to relax. Rizzo ti's the future. We have soldiers on board, E-X Grunts, the baddest of the bad...and their weapons? I'm sure are slightly more advanced than what you're used to. 
[21]Are all twenty-first century girls like you? 
[22]Outta here? 
[23]Now hold on! We should hear her out! 
[24]No shit. I got no problem with that. 
[25]Rizzo, he's out there. 
[26]I'm thinking Rizzo was right. 
[27]Maybe we should go with them. Like you said, your Space Lab connections can deal with this At least we'll be safe. 
[28]We're screwed. 
[29]
[30]He's right behind us! 
[31]Shit! Move it! He's coming! 
[32]Go! 
[33]Faster! 
[34]
[35]He's right on my ass! 
[36]Well, I'm not hanging out here with Ms. Showtunes. 
[37]Just go! I've a feeling he's right behind us! 
[38]No you don't! 
[39]Kkinsa, open the goddamn door! 
[40]Med-kit? 
[41]We're screwed! 
[42]We lost crutch. 
[43]Back to the labs! 
[44]Hey! That hurts. 
[45]Push off toward us. 
[46]Do it Rizzo! We'll catch you. 
[47]What if we don't? 
[48]He's coming right at you! 
[49]Rizzo?! 
[50]So that's it then. 
[51]That's a good fantasy, though. Kinky, but good. 
[52]It's the engine, reactors, audiometers, it's the stuff that makes the ship go zoom. 
[53]We'd need charges. 
[54]The engine room will have molecular welders. We could seal up the hull. 
[55]Remember to roll his balls around a bit. 
[56]How many? 
[57]Don't blow your foot off. 
[58]See anything? 
[59]I think I speak on behalf of the group when I say this is bad news. 
[60]Put your finger here. 
[61]My father wanted me to be a businessman. 
[62]That's why I'm here. 
[63]My father's company imports and exports. Archaeology is part of the business. We happen to get along just smartass. Look, why don't you bust somebody else's for a change. 
[64]You thought I meant...too tough to apologize, huh? You must have been a very lonely girl. 
[65]Were you close to your father? 
[66]It's on the table where I left it! What the hell are you doing?! Hurry up! 
[67]Sorry, you were saying? 
[68]And what happend to ...? 
[69]Well, we'd be dead without you. You know that, don't you? 
[70]It's true. You caused enough stink that we were at least a little cautious. Of course this is the first field trip I went on that had a body count. 
[71]I'm not much, but I promise, I won't let this guy get you. 
[72]We're blowing three. Hang on. 
[73]You tell me! She's only set one charge. And it's not finished! 
[74]He's coming!!! 
[75]Holy shit! 
[76]Then stop talking and work faster! 
[77]You lost the charge? 
[78]Then what do we do?! 
[79]Well, it was a good plan. 
[80]I need another minute. Come on! 
[81]
[82]Done! 
[83]Shit, hurry! 
[84]Faster! Don't we have another gun? 
[85]They'll make it. 
[86]
[87]Damnit! 
[88]Forget it. I had to rewire it. Once it's started it won't stop. 
[89]Get ready to blow it. 
[90]Now! 
[91]I think...I think maybe we did. 
[92]See? We're not so bad. 
[93]It bought us some time. 
[94]Again?! Jesus! 
[95]Then do it. The rescue ship can find us here right? 
[96]You ain't catching my ass in there again. 
[97]You? 
[98]Almost got it. 
[99]Damn that was close! 
[100]Okay?!! 
[101]Got it. You ever space walked? 
[102]Earth II. 
[103]I'll help you in. 
[104]I knew you were a little sick, but Geez. 
[105]That sounds like Rizzo having faith in some of that future shit. 
[106]Well, do something! 
[107]Boeman, the ships not here. 
[108]Hey, easy now. 
[109]You wanna release your air tanks? 
[110]You'll be fine. 
[111]Don't worry. He can't get through that door. 
[112]Rizzo, you okay? 
[113]You're doing fine. I won't let anything happen to you, remember? 
[114]Rizzo, did they have chinese food in your time? 
[115]Did you like it? 
[116]Shut up, Thorgan! 
[117]I know you. 
[118]Nooooooo!! 
[119]Rizzo, pull away! 
[120]You okay?! 
[121]No thank you, you crazy old woman. 
[122]Well I mean, technically you are old enough to be my great, great, great...
dialogues.BOEMAN:
[1]North three clicks. 
[2]There! 
[3]Creepy. 
[4]There was a hall of a battle down here. 
[5]Er, guy? I'm picking up some movement. 
[6]I'm on it! 
[7]Left at the end of the hall! 
[8]Here. We're one meter from the surface! 
[9]Stoney, you catch. 
[10]We're clear! Let's go! 
[11]No! 
[12]That wasn't so bad. 
[13]And you said high school was boring. 
[14]Hockey. 
[15]We've got a heartbeat! 
[16]Stoney, you copy? She's awake. You coming? 
[17]Yes, right now! 
[18]Stoney, put your pants on and get your ass down here! 
[19]Brodski! Get to Lab two. We have an emergency! 
[20]Sergeant, this is Boemen... 
[21]You've lost Condor. 
[22]Briggs, Geko, movement beyond the boxed fuselage. 
[23]He's right there! In front of you! 
[24]Sergeant, you've lost two more men! 
[25]Duck fuckers? 
[26]That door's the only way in or out and it won't open without the code. 
[27]Uh...that's gonna be a problem. The ship's not on auto-pilot. We're flying blind. Thirty minutes till impact. 
[28]Help me! 
[29]You forgot didn't you, you old fart? 
[30]Better let me. 
[31]What do you mean, not enough time? 
[32]Nooooo! 
[33]You'll hit crutch! 
[34]Uh-oh. 
[35]Kkinsa! Open the doors! 
[36]Kkinsa! He's coming! Open the doors! 
[37]Kkinsa! No!!! 
[38]We're not leaving Crutch! 
[39]Everyone okay? 
[40]Goodbye old friend. 
[41]Could you show a little compassion?! 
[42]reaches for DeLongpre. Inches away. Finally he grabs Delongpre by the locks of his hair, pulls himself closer. 
[43]Grab my feet! 
[44]Thorgan, pull us in. 
[45]The ship's in bad shape. Back to the labs. Let's check out status. 
[46]Shit! 
[47]Rizzo! Can you hear me?! 
[48]There's a red lever on the wall beside you. Pull it! 
[49]Then break it! If you don't pull it, the ship's going to depressurize! 
[50]Hurry Rizzo! You have to reverse the pressurization. 
[51]What are you doing?!! 
[52]Rizzo pull the fucking lever! 
[53]THat's the sound of deep space attacking the integrity of the ship. 
[54]When the left hull goes, so will the right. 
[55]We could convert fission transistors. 
[56]What are you gonna do, tell me? 
[57]I'll need system four converters. 
[58]Bring 'em all. Let's move! 
[59]Then you better hurry. I'll blow alley one, Delongpre, you and Rizzo take there. Janessa you ready two and we'll meet up there. 
[60]Thorgan? You coming?! 
[61]Thorgan, quit screwing around and come on! 
[62]I'm blowing Walkway One. Hold on. 
[63]Janessa, we're on our way to you! 
[64]Where is...? 
[65]Where have you been?!! 
[66]Run!! 
[67]We don't have a choice! 
[68]What are we waiting for?!! Come on!! 
[69]Where the hell were you?!! 
[70]Toss me a chip. 
[71]Thorgan, you're brilliant. Have I told you that lately? 
[72]I'd say we have about ten minutes tops. 
[73]Okay, Janessa, give me your last charge. 
[74]If we don't sever the hull completely she'll drag us down with her. 
[75]I don't know! 
[76]Sergeant? We thought you were... 
[77]Explosive. We're blowing the walkway. 
[78]Rizzo did. 
[79]What are you doing back?!! 
[80]What? 
[81]Hurry up people! We're running out of time. 
[82]Two more charges to go. 
[83]Let's move out! 
[84]Shit! 
[85]Done!! 
[86]
[87]What...? 
[88]What are you doing?!! 
[89]Hurry! 
[90]Minimal. 
[91]I've changed the course for Earth II. And I sent a distress signal. 
[92]Our ship has been damaged, most of the crew dead. We need evac. 
[93]We're going home people. 
[94]This way! 
[95]The pressures cause the engines to overheat! Hurry! 
[96]And now we're all out of it. 
[97]The ship's depressurizing, the engines overheating. When it  reaches the core, we're done. 
[98]Somebody's gonna have to go back to the engine room. 
[99]You're too weak. I'll go. 
[100]Hurry up, guys. We've got the rescue ship on radar. 
[101]The docking bay was damaged after the explosion. Meet us at the airlock. 
[102]Suit up. 
[103]Thorgan, suit up. 
[104]Just a little more time. 
[105]Sergeant! 
[106]Use the thrusters and you'll be fine. We'll huddle together out there. 
[107]Remember, stay calm, use your thrusters. We'll be fine. 
[108]Thrusters.
dialogues.THORGAN:
[1]Somebody wanted the place to stay hidden. 
[2]Cool! This is an automatic "A". 
[3]Cool. 
[4]I'm trying to give her some personality. 
[5]That's a strange design, don't you think? 
[6]The cryo unit leaked. The computers sealed the room. No airborne viruses no hazardous materials. I've shut down the until. Alright, stand back. 
[7]Sorry. I'll fix her when we get back. 
[8]Hey check this out! 
[9]This caused the leak and there's an occupant. 
[10]Relax, it's only a  glitch in the system. 
[11]They're not after us. Their sensors are locked in on . . . him! 
[12]Nice touch. 
[13]Sorry . . . I'll fix her . . . I promise. 
[14]Have I told you guys how much I love this class? 
[15]Damn! Talk about your hard nipples. 
[16]400 years . . . I bet she'll be horny. 
[17]Everything looks good. 
[18]This is what it means right here. 
[19]Cool! 
[20]Anybody seen the reticulator? 
[21]Wakey wakey love birds . . . Yllo's gonna be pissed if he catches you fooling around instead of working. 
[22]Bye, lovebirds . . . Stoney, you dog. 
[23]That one did it! 
[24]The hockey player? He a friend of yours? 
[25]He's dead! Everyone's dead! Old Earth is dead! 
[26]What have you done? 
[27]Each blip represents a trained killer. It's men like that fought off the pirates on Earth II, battled Jauntuns on the solar moons... 
[28]Exactly. 
[29]You see that? 
[30]Jesus, is this what it was like on your... 
[31]Yes! 
[32]She's obviously dealt with this guy before. 
[33]Maybe if we knew a little bit more about what we're delaing with here... 
[34]Rizzo, a shuttle out in the middle of space? We'll die oout there. 
[35]Yuck. 
[36]But... 
[37]Jesus, tell this asshole I don't play hockey! 
[38]Go-go-go-go-go!!!! 
[39]I didn't do it. The fall scattered her programming..wait. Where's? Shit! 
[40]Hey, I think the fall killed him. 
[41]Where'd you get the gun? 
[42]I feel better. Now how do you fire this damn thing? 
[43]Oh shit! There he is! 
[44]Did we get him? 
[45]I think I broke my arm. 
[46]Oh shit. 
[47]This is crazy, we can't do anything like this! 
[48]Grab my hand! 
[49]I'm gonna spew. 
[50]What now? 
[51]You think it killed . . . Yeah, I guess not. 
[52]The hull's imploding! 
[53]Hurry! She's lost it! 
[54]You read a lot of Science Fiction didn't you? 
[55]Am I in there? 
[56]Sure but what good will that do? 
[57]We're not supposed to do that. 
[58]Would you? 
[59]They're back here. 
[60]Hey! I'm not ready. 
[61]You're leaving me here alone? 
[62]Come here, might as well fix that arm. 
[63]Almost done. 
[64]Oh, hush. I disengaged your pain programming. 
[65]Sorry, sorry. 
[66]Good point. 
[67]Delongpre? What did you do with the chain gun? 
[68]I'm on my way. 
[69]I'm coming, I'm coming. 
[70]Yes, I've reprogrammed you. You are very brave. Bad ass. 
[71]Kay-Em, you okay? 
[72]See you around. 
[73]Kay-Em! 
[74]You did good, Kay-Em. I'm proud of you. 
[75]As long as they're connected we can blow them all simultaneously from a safe distance. 
[76]Done! 
[77]Kay-Em? Re-engage killer instinct. 
[78]Kay-Em!!! 
[79]Kay-Em! Get away! 
[80]Kay-Em we made it! 
[81]Kaboom. 
[82]What kind of a distraction? 
[83]It's okay. 
[84]Just come on, I've got an idea. 
[85]Don't worry. He can't see us. 
[86]Kay-Em, you've saved our lives, you know that don't you? 
[87]Goodbye, my love. 
[88]This is gonna work. If he sticks to the program. Will he? Stick to the program? 
[89]Oh, shit. He's going to see us. 
[90]Shit! 
[91]He's trying to ask you out on a date. 
[92]We're too far away! 
[93]Kay-em you okay? 
[94]I missed you too.
dialogues.BRODSKI:
[1]What the hell were you thinking? 
[2]Not so fast Yllo! There's a protocol here. 
[3]My god! This is way over your head, pal. We need to call some experts and . . . 
[4]You're a teacher. 
[5]What if they're carrying? Did you even check? 
[6]How do you know that piece of cursed rock down there doesn't carry something metal tits can't detect? 
[7]Damnit, Yllo! I don't like it. 
[8]I still think we should send for a team of real scientists. 
[9]Right now, I care only for the safety of this crew. You don't know anything about these two - 
[10]Jesus what the hell is that? 
[11]My job. 
[12]I like her already. 
[13]Give it a rest Yllo. She needs some time. 
[14]I'm with you kid. 
[15]Lab two, relax. What's the matter? He's dead. 
[16]Jesus, God! 
[17]Dallas! That you? Come back! 
[18]Dallas?! Dallas?! Do you copy? 
[19]Kicker, Sven. Get into the grid and tell me what the hell is going on! 
[20]I doubt that. I think we can handle whatever your ancient hockey player can throw at us. 
[21]Dead? 
[22]Report to weapons. We're going on a hunt. 
[23]Yllo, what's your head count? 
[24]This place should be safe. Get them back here. I don't want to be hunting around and kill one of your kids by accident. As much as I've dreamed of doing that. 
[25]I need to know what you know about this guy. 
[26]Not an option. I'm going to hunt this son of a bitch down. 
[27]I've been a grunt for fifteen years. There's not a problem I can't fix with enough ammunition. 
[28]Not a chance. 
[29]You got that right. 
[30]You sumbitch! Three dead! On my watch! If that...that thing is out there, it's dead! You got it!!! 
[31]Now get out of our way...get back to the lab and baby sit your snot nosed brats... we've got a job to do! 
[32]Got it! Let's move out girls. Yllo go to Lab two and cover out backs. 
[33]I'll try. 
[34]Alright, the teach requests we take this guy out at the knees. I say shoot to kill. 
[35]So after you've killed him, put one in his knee so we can say we tried. 
[36]Go to infrared, stay in radio contact. Teach you there? 
[37]You just keep an eye out. 
[38]Let's move out. 
[39]Two teams, Port, starboard. 
[40]Kicker, anything? 
[41]Briggs, Geko, talk to me! 
[42]DAMNIT to hell! We're coming to you! 
[43]Teach! Where the hell are you?! Where's our visuals?!! 
[44]wHAT'S My status?! I've lost three men and your worthless fuck! After I kill this asshole I'm coming your Yllo! 
[45]Kicker? Where are you? 
[46]Find Crutch! Set up an ion field around the cargo bay. We'll torch the sucker! Yllo...you're a dead man! 
[47]What? 
[48]Where is everybody? What happened? 
[49]Give me a break! What happened? 
[50]Space Lab?! Wait'll I get my hands on Yllo. 
[51]Takes more than a steelbalde to take this old dog down. 
[52]Yup, that ought'a do it. 
[53]He-help me... 
[54]You stupid bitch! 
[55]Damnit to hell, you left me back there to die! 
[56]Yeah, yeah. Well, what have you got to say for yourself? 
[57]Bomb? 
[58]How much you need? 
[59]Blowing the walkway? You come up with that yourself? 
[60]Kid, you ever thought about the marine corp? 
[61]Well fuck me. 
[62]Damage? 
[63]I'm pulling, damnit! 
[64]Well, that's a shame. 
[65]We need weapons. 
[66]Can't shut em' down from here. 
[67]I'll go. 
[68]Get out of here! 
[69]That all you got?!! 
[70]Still barely alive barrels into Jason, vlinging to his back. He turns, slashes with his knife and severs the hoses. Jason and Brodski tumble towards EARTH II. 
[71]Yeee---Haaaaa!!
dialogues.JANESSA:
[1]Bitch looks dead to me. 
[2]First field trip and you think you're a Scientist. Move out of the way geek. 
[3]Okay rent-a-cop, do your shit. I gotta date tonight. 
[4]They're just subclass B droids. I'm so not impressed. 
[5]Oh, was that the hand you beat off with? 
[6]Oh that's scientific. 
[7]She's not that great. 
[8]It's just like Thorgan's. What do you think this means? 
[9]Small brains make your balls itch? 
[10]All this science shit, makes me horny. Take off your cloths, we don't have much time. 
[11]You're quicker than usual. 
[12]You prefer an apple? 
[13]Oh my God! Adrienne? 
[14]Maybe she tripped. 
[15]You know, Stoney's done everyone on this trip but me..what's up with that? 
[16]Look ice chip, why don't you just chill out and let us handle this? 
[17]What are you doing? 
[18]What do we do?!! 
[19]Okay, I'm guessing you should hurry. 
[20]That was fun. 
[21]Thorgan?! 
[22]I think your metal lover's losing it. 
[23]What?! 
[24]Okay, tell you what. You die, we'll run. 
[25]You geeks wanna gimmie a hand? 
[26]This is just great. 
[27]Boeman, can you reach DeLongpre? We'll push you in. 
[28]Forget her, she's a pain in the ass. Let her hang there. 
[29]That ought'a help the situation. 
[30]Okay that hurt. 
[31]Shit. He's gonna send himself right at us. 
[32]Get off of me! 
[33]Let's just get out of here. 
[34]So what else is new? 
[35]Are you crazy?! Pull the lever! 
[36]You happy? You've killed us all! 
[37]What's the point? 
[38]No. 
[39]A little late to be thinking about escape, isn't it? 
[40]You know, Yllo seemed to think we could catch this guy alive, well, he'd be worth millions. 
[41]I'm just saying. 
[42]YeaH, GREAT IDEA! And I'll keep the big guy distracted with a blow job. 
[43]You're so bossy. 
[44]Thorgan, you little shit, is that you? 
[45]Damnit! You scared the hell out of me! 
[46]Jason. He's what happened. Then Grendel hit Space Lab. 
[47]Yllo's dead. We...we thought you were too. 
[48]Lights a flare, blinding Jason for the moment. Then she sinks the Rhino syringe into his chest! Jason stumbles...falls hard on his ass and sits there staring at her. 
[49]Well go on! Pass out! 
[50]Shit. 
[51]He....He... 
[52]He came for me, I had to run! 
[53]I...I don't know what I did... 
[54]He was chasing me! 
[55]I don't know...sorry? 
[56]They're not gonna make it. Close the door before he gets us all. 
[57]Close the fucking door! 
[58]Pull me in!
dialogues.KKINSA:
[1]I have an idea, why don't you go find them and we'll get the hell out of here! 
[2]Okay, I'm outta here. 
[3]No way! I'm not staying here any longer . . . I have a life you know. 
[4]I feel compelled to ask why we are ignoring that. 
[5]You're toast, mister. 
[6]So don't open the door. 
[7]You're opening the door? What about the . . . ? 
[8]What's going on? 
[9]This is bad, no? 
[10]There goes prom night. 
[11]Have I told you guys how much I hate this class? 
[12]This bores me. 
[13]Adrienne?! Of all people! 
[14]Adrienne?! 
[15]Bed! 
[16]How bad do you want it? 
[17]Yes . . . yes . . . that's it! 
[18]No shit, we've got a heart beat! 
[19]No . . . not yet! 
[20]
[21]Sstoney's dead! 
[22]I'll go. 
[23]Fuck Yllo! 
[24]I don't understand...what does he want? 
[25]What? 
[26]How do you know? 
[27]Something's wrong. 
[28]Rizzo, I think Yllo must have done something. The door won't open. 
[29]The power's back up! 
[30]Thirty seconds. 
[31]Rizzo, come on! 
[32]What?!! 
[33]But?!!
dialogues.KICKER:
[1]Yo, Teach, what the fuck? 
[2]Get your ass back to the shuttle. I'll check it out. 
[3]All right, all right, enough with the history lesson. Lets find these two quick . . so I can kick some little punk ass. 
[4]Back to the shuttle! All of you! I'll find them.

[7]We're outta here! 
[8]Don't touch that! 
[9]Defense droids. I'm on it.

[11]Stand back! 
[12]Come on!

[16]Then duck. 
[17]Make it happen! 
[18]They've got me! Let go!

[25]Fuckin A...

dialogues.AZRAEL:
[1]I've got my project. What are you losers gonna do? 
[2]Cool . . . check out my arm.

[4]I'm missing a fucking arm heeeerrrr- Oh, that's dreamy. 
[5]That is soooo cool! 
[6]Oh shit I forgot my arm! 
[7]Watch it punk, I'm armed. 
[8]You'll pay for that. 
[9]Lucky?! 
[10]Another hour and I'd have lost the arm. 
[11]I better get extra credit for this shit.

[13]You got lucky. 
[14]Speaking of which, duck! 
[15]What the?! 
[16]Pause play. 
[17]Hey cool. They brought ancient hockey guy back to life. 
[18]Hey! We're playing a game here. Get off the court! 
[19]Asshole that does not count as a kill. 
[20]Oh, come on! 
[21]Alright, asshole. 
[22]Clear off the court, asshole. 
[23]Yeah yeah I better call the labs, see what the hell is going on. 
[24]Lab...this is AZ in the game grid. Your guy got out and runined our game. 
[25]I said the guy in the mask is in here ruining our game. 
[26]Send someone to the grid to pick him up. He looks lost. 
[27]All right fine, we'll head back--

[7]Here. Dumbass.

dialogues.JASON:
[1]Turns his glare on our heroes racing toward Delongpre at the other end. 
[2]
